platform.summary: QAP is an open source software that can be used to analyze virus quasispecies using CBS, NGS and TGS data. wQAP (web QAP), is the online version of QAP.
comments: wQAP is the online version of [QAP](http://life2cloud.com:6005/qap), the *Quasispecies Analysis Package*, and contains all the programs in QAP, and there are nearly no differences between them.
QAP is also available in a [docker image at Docker Hub](https://hub.docker.com/r/mingjiewang/qap/).
quotas: An account is required to do work; anyone can create an account.
citations: Wang, M., Li, J., Zhang, X., Han, Y., Yu, D., Zhang, D., Yuan, Z., Yang, Z., Huang, J., & Zhang, X. (2020). [An integrated software for virus community sequencing data analysis](https://doi.org/10.1186/s12864-020-6744-4). *BMC Genomics*, 21(1), 363. https://doi.org/10.1186/s12864-020-6744-4
sponsors: [Research Laboratory of Clinical Virology, Ruijin Hospital, Shanghai Jiaotong University, School of Medicine, Shanghai, China](https://www.shsmu.edu.cn/english/)
